column4: Two graphics cards: Intel onboard 3100 and GeForce FX 5600 PCI.  I want to stretch my desktop across them, but the Intel does not show up in "displays".  It DOES show the "Ubuntu" logo on startup, but that's all.  When I remove the PCI card, the Intel works great.  Any ideas all?
virtually all mainboards disable the onboard cards when they detect a second card plugged into an expansion slot. you'll have to get two PCI cards then
funny part is, both work fine in the windows partition.  There are no entry in bios to both with the onboard card.  So I doubt that's the issue.
maybe some driver has a trick to enable both, i've seen that on some boards. chances are its not documented and some reverse engineered driver didn't copy it
